Anime Futuristic Male Value Pack
kDesc
In the future, you won't have to dress yourself. Until then, you'll need these. Includes 5 items: top, trousers, shoes, gloves and mask. [#Legal]
Dans le futur, on n'aura plus besoin de s'habiller. En attendant, pourquoi ne pas porter ce pack comprenant 5 éléments : une veste, un pantalon, des chaussures, des gants et un masque. [#Legal]
In der Zukunft muss man sich nicht mehr selbst anziehen. Bis dahin gibt es dieses Paket. Enthält 5 Teile: Oberteil, Unterteil, Schuhe, Handschuhe und Maske. [#Legal]
Nel futuro, non avrai bisogno di vestirti. Fino ad allora, ecco qualcosa che ti servirà. Include 5 oggetti: giacca, pantaloni, scarpe, guanti e maschera. [#Legal]
En el futuro no hará falta vestirse. Entre tanto, esto te vendrá bien. Incluye 5 objetos: bata, pantalón, calzado, guantes y máscara. [#Legal]
In the future, you won't have to dress yourself. Until then, you'll need these. Includes 5 items: top, pants, shoes, gloves and mask. [#Legal]
미래에는 스스로 옷을 입을 필요가 없습니다. 하지만 그 전까지는 이 아이템들이 필요할지도 모릅니다. 이 세트는 상의, 하의, 신발, 장갑, 그리고 마스크를 포함합니다. [#Legal]
In the future, you won't have to dress yourself. Until then, you'll need these. Includes 5 items: top, pants, shoes, gloves and mask. [#Legal]
將來，你將無須穿衣服。但那一天來臨之前，你將需要這五件道具：上衣、褲、鞋子、手套及面具。 [#Legal]
將來，你將無須穿衣服。但那一天來臨之前，你將需要這五件道具：上衣、褲、鞋子、手套及面具。 [#Legal]
In the future, you won't have to dress yourself. Until then, you'll need these. Includes 5 items: top, pants, shoes, gloves and mask. [#Legal]
